MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:28 am in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35 am on 23rd February, 2021.
